text:
This was my first time trying pizza from this brand. I ordered a cheese pizza, which, based on the menu photo, is supposed to have spinach on top. However, the pizza I received did not include any spinach. When I asked the staff about this, the initial response was dismissive, with one staff member simply saying, 'That's just how it is.' I received the same answer when asked again. Upon asking a senior staff member, I was informed that the spinach they received that day was spoiled, so it could not be used.

While I understand the situation with the spinach, it would have been courteous and professional to inform me beforehand, allowing me to choose an alternative topping or even a different item. The lack of communication and the indifferent attitude of some staff members left me feeling disappointed and undervalued as a customer. Clearer communication and better customer service would greatly enhance the experience.

Worst pizza in Singapore. The ‚Äúall meat‚Äù pizza was mostly onion. Pepperoni pizza - one piece per slice. The photos are nice, the actual food is awful. Avoid - do not order from here. Terrible! Terrible! Terrible!

Loving the pizza, our 2nd time eating it this week. However the cashier this evening was subpar. Got our orders wrong and cut a large pizza into 4 pieces instead of 8. Appeared non chalent spending most of the time using phone and didnt help colleage busy at the back
So-so taste for a small pizza at $10.80.. food was ready but the device didnt ring üò∂
Not worth the price. Overall taste was so so. Pizza didn‚Äôt turn out like the photo too. Prawns were small, overly salty and seemed like the frozen kind.
